For each even n, find the values of 20^n, 16^n, and 3^n when taken modulo 323.

Similarly, compute 3^n mod 323 using relevant modular arithmetic properties.
Evaluate the expression 20^n + 16^n - 3^n - 1 modulo 323 using the results from the previous steps.

Consider the periodicity in the sequences of powers modulo 323, and check for repeated patterns or cycles which simplify the computation.
Summarize all possible values of the original expression modulo 323 considering different even values of n.
